Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32C350 Review from LCD TV Buying Guide
Reviews.Author: LCDTVBuyingGuide
Reviews.Content: Picture Quality Performance: With 480i images we noted some jerky motion artifacts in the background of some scenes. However, I did not see much offensive negatives in the foreground and was very pleased with the detail offered in 480i. The processors did a very nice job. Color rendition was not oversaturated, if not sometimes a little muted.With our Blu Ray set to 720p resolution to match the TVs resolution we were very impressed at the bright sharp images and intense color offered. The TV really has a lot of pop with HD material. We also did not note the negative background judder with HD material and this proved out with our HD HQV processor testing as well. Black levels were deep and occasionally oversaturated but not often enough to really be a strike against. Dark shadow detail was totally acceptable for a TV of this size and price range.Off center viewing was average on this LCD TV with the contrast and black levels fading at around 35 degrees off angle - again not bad for this price range.Calibration: Calibration through the menu was easy and the C350 did a nice job calibrating to near D6500K. There are advanced white balance controls included on this TV which is unusual for this price point. There are also many more advanced settings than I would have thought such as Black Tone, Dynamic Contrast, a Gamma setting, and a nifty Flesh Tone setting that will take the onscreen flesh tones from a yellowish to a pinkish appearance at your whim without changing the overall color appearance of the picture much.Picture settings as calibrated from the Custom Setting:Backlight: 8Contrast: 92Brightness: 46Sharpness: 10Color: 53Tint: UnchangedBlack Tone: DarkDynamic Contrast: LowGamma: +1Color Space: NativeWhite Balance-  Rgain: 27  Roffset: 24Flesh Tone: +1Edge Enhancement: OffAs far as aesthetic considerations go, the LN32C350 has straightforward design and better than the other 32" models on the market except the LG's. You almost cant believe how light the TV is upon lifting it, a scant 15.7 pounds. The TV is 3.25" in depth and 8" with the stand. The included table stand is very light and inexpensive and the TV must be turned on its head and the table stand screwed on upside down to accomplish the assembly. It would be more convenient if Samsung would just include the stand already assembled on the TV, same as some other manufacturers. The table top stand does not swivel side to side. The 2" bezel framing of the TV is gloss black and non-spectacular but does contain a sloped design element at the bottom.Audio Output: The two inbuilt 5 watt speakers barely get the job done. From 10 feet the user will need to keep the volume control at 75% of total capacity. The volume quality also is lacking with a tinny character and no base - but that's about all you can expect from 5 watt speakers.For more plus the overall ratings see LCD TV Buying Guide.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture for this Price
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: It's rare that i'm so pleased with a purchase so I just had to write a review.  After a very... very extensive search and looking at a lot of TV me and my GF just got this TV, it was our first big purchase together after moving in together.  Simply put this tv has amazing picture quality for the price we paid.  Also alot of people are complaining about the amount of inputs this TV has... but it's an HDTV, samsung isn't expecting you to connect your stuff to it with composite cables... what a waste!  I bought an HDMI cable for our cable box and one for our xbox360 and now we can hook up both and enjoying amazing HD quality picture.The one weakness of this TV is the sound is so weak! But all the TVs we looked at in this size/price range had weak sound so i guess that's just the way it is now as most manufactures expect it to be used with a home theater system.  honestly tho, compared to the other TVs this sound quality sounds really good... it's not at all loud, but at least it sounds good.

Reviews.Title: Great Bedroom HDTV
Reviews.Author: Don G. Connell "Blu-Ray Nut"
Reviews.Content: I upgraded my bedroom tv to this Samsung HDTV.  The picture and quality of a Samsung HDTV is outstanding.  I had another brand of HDTV in there first, but with the new HD Receiver I purchased, I couldn't get a picture on it.  I moved it to another room and with the Samsung I had no problem at all.  I now have 3 Samsung LCD HDTV sets in my house, Living Room 52", bedroom 32" and 23" in dressing room.  I couldn't be happier with my purchases of Samsung HDTV TV Sets.I have had several people tell me that they have never seen a better picture on a HDTV than the ones I have.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the price!!
Reviews.Author: W. H. walters
Reviews.Content: This is my second 32inch Samsung purchase.  My first was 6yrs ago and I paid $1450.00 for a 32" that has less features than this one at $329.00.  So when the wife and I decided to get rid of the old CRT TV upstairs we jumped on this deal.I was a little worried about the sound quality because of the reviews but the sound quality is excellent!  It has 2 10watt speakers and a 5 band equalizer that comes with 5 presets and will allow you to set it up however you like. I honestly have no idea what people are talking about unless the volume coming out of their cable box is really low.  I turn my volume output of the cable box all the way up, then turn on the TRU Surround sound and set the EQ to the movie preset. You wont need to turn the TV volume past 15.The picture quality is fantastic and you have lots of adjustments you can make if needed.  Mine was perfect right out of the box.The USB port will allow you to view pictures & listen to mp3's and is controlled with the TV's remote.It is super lightweight and takes only a few minutes to set up.  I recommend you get an HDTV BOX with am HDMI output from your cable/satellite company.  Comcast even included an HDMI cable at no charge.Bottom Line:  If your looking for a basic model HDTV that has a great picture & sound look no further. I know its only 720p but honestly the human eye cannot tell the difference between 1080p & 720p on sets that are less than 42inch's.  My parents have a 32 inch 720p Samsung in their bedroom and a 52 inch 1080p Sony Bravia in the rec room and both of them agree that the Samsung has a better picture. In my opinion Samsung TV's have the best picture out there and amazon.com has worry free customer service.  So what are you waiting for?

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: snkalaska
Reviews.Content: I've been using this TV for about a month and everything is great. It is very lightweight so could be easily mounted on the wall. I haven't used all the outputs but did like the S-video out to my surround sound that my old TV didn't have. Just plugged everything in and started watching. The audio volume is a little weak so only gave 4 stars for sound.

Reviews.Title: Just what I'd expect from Samsung, a great TV!
Reviews.Author: J. Howell
Reviews.Content: Bought this new 32" Samsung LCD TV for the bedroom and couldn't be happier with it.  Hooked up to upconverting DVD player and watched Avatar.  Picture and sound are both impressive.  This is the third Samsung HDTV that we've purchased for our house and we love them all!

Reviews.Title: My First Hand Experience with This TV
Reviews.Author: Joe P. "Root Beer Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: A few months ago I set out to purchase a 32 inch TV for one of my bedrooms, preferably one for under 500 dollars. When buying a TV that size in that price range, it is important to do research and try different models, more so than on a more expensive set. This is because many of these models are entry level/ value sets and you will most likely have to sacrifice in some regard. If you could find a perfect TV for under 500 bucks, it wouldn't be under 500 bucks.Anyway, this was one of the models I tried. The TV is extremely light, which is a plus. In fact, after trying out other models before this one and having a general idea of the weight, I actually thought that there was something missing when I picked up the box at Wal-Mart. REALLY light compared to other 32 inch non-LED models. Unboxing and set up was very easy. The stand is probably one of the easiest stands I've ever assembled. Just a few screws at the bottom. And it looked and felt like a decent, sturdy stand, so that was not sacrificed. When first turning it on, I was pretty satisfied. The picture was amazing. And this was just the standard setting without manual tweaking. There was some slight vertical banding, but that is too be expected. Very minor, however. The sounds was fine. I've read some bad reviews about the sound, but I was OK with it. But it must be noted that I'm not one to blast the volume. I had it set at 20 and it was more than adequate. So everything looked fine... until i noticed some ghosting on fast moving images. It was pretty annoying. Not the standard motion blur, but rather a ghosting pattern on fast moving images. A puck during a hockey game would leave a streak behind it, things like that. I tried to get used to it, but I just couldn't. I ended up returning the set.Now, it must be noted that i read several reviews about this TV and did not notice anyone with similar issues. So it is possible that maybe it was just a problem with my particular unit. Either way, because of the ghosting i give it a 4. Without that, this would definetly be a 5. Real nice picture, decent sound, decent everything, and great value.

Reviews.Title: Limited Inputs
Reviews.Author: Jennifer D. Gregory
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is pretty good, and it's one of the cheapest HD sets for this size. But there is only a SHARED component/composite input so you can only have one device of either type plugged in at a time. (Composite switchboxes are easy to pick up, but good luck finding a switch box that handles both composite and component.) Since all the female plugs are in the back (none on the side, as mid and upper range TVs for easy access and switching of cables), this is very inconvenient. This set was for our son, who has both a GameCube (composite) and a PS2 (component). He just plays the PS2 and the GameCube collects dust.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: L. Donadio
Reviews.Content: I am pretty much writing this review for those who keep complaining about the sound on the Samsung TVs.  It's an easy fix if you go into the volume range settings on your cable box.  There should be settings for narrow, wide and normal---just switch until you find the one that fixes the volume for you (but make sure you have already configured your cable box remote to work with the TV).  I have 2 of these Samsung TVs and they are both amazing.  My only slight complaint is with the inputs on the back and not being able to hook up the DVD right away but I ordered an HDMI cable and should be good to go.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the proce
Reviews.Author: RGL
Reviews.Content: Bought this based on the quality picture of my 46-inch Samsung, which has been perfect for two years now ... this was perfect size for our small den.Very sharp picture, easy to set up.Note that Samsung has upgraded this set over the year. I suspect complaints about sound come from sets that had 5 Watts x 2 speakers. They now are 10 Watts x 2. Mine is plenty loud. (Also, apparently some people have forgot to remove the clear tape over the speakers!)Also, when released, the response time was 8ms. The later sets now have 6 ms. Both of above make it an even better buy than when released.Don't sweat the 720p ... on a set this size, the difference in quality from 1080p is not noticeable, so don't spend the money.I love Samsung. The best TV picure quality going ...

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Joseph Williams
Reviews.Content: Excellent Flat Screen HD TV.  We needed a bedroom TV.  This TV met the size requirements and has all the features of a Big Screen TV.  Picture is sharp and features are just what we needed in the bedroom.  Has a sleep timer which allows us to watch until asleep. Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Weak speakers, great picture, more connectors than advertised
Reviews.Author: A reader
Reviews.Content: I've only had the TV for one day, so I don't know about long-term reliability. The picture quality is very high.  No noticeable glare.  The speakers, even at max volume are frequently not loud enough.  Some adjustment on volumes of different frequency ranges helps with, but does not solve, the volume issue (bass seems to outweigh treble as the default setting).  The sound on the 10 year old TV it replaced was actually better, which is a little sad.The specs for connectors above list only two HDMI connectors, but I was pleasantly surprised that it has component video, standard audio, coax and VGA as well.  No standard video RCA video port, which is sort of annoying, but it hooked up to my xbox and comcast cable box fine.  It did not detect the correct aspect ratio for component video and that needed to be manually changed from 16:9 to 4:3 on the cable box.Overall, it seems like a decent but not great TV, but it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Very poor sound with a good picture
Reviews.Author: Iva H. Vicari "golden ager"
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these tvs for Christmas. I was very dissapointed. The  picture was good but the sound was very bad. The sound worbled at a low and medium range and you could not get a loud volumn range at all. It was very difficult to understand what was being said. I returned both after contacting Samsung who agreed after listening to the souond test on the one that I had hooked up that the sound was not ok.I held the phone if front of tv so he could hear sound test. He suggested I send it to Samsung for a tech. to look at it.I was going to do that but  I later tried the other one thinking it might have only been the one set. The 2nd set was worse then the first one. I could have returned the sets to samsung for repair but with both being bad I didn't expect this particular model to be much better after repair. I elected to return both to the seller VONN. I have bought many items from Amazon because they are great to deal with. I assume VONN will be good about the returns as well since they are hooked up with Amazon and both tvs had bad sound.

Reviews.Title: nice tv for the price
Reviews.Author: bugguy73
Reviews.Content: 32" of 720p goodness, its very nice across the room for use as a monitor for a computer and tv, it has hdmi inputs, rgb computer inputs, component hd inputs and cable in.  the menu features are very nice and the comcast remote syncs up very well.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV
Reviews.Author: MR Dave "Mr Dave."
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture and seems to be a quality product, BUT the sound is LOW. After playing with the settings and returning everything to factory settings the volume increased and was much better, picture is nice, however I still think Toshiba makes a better TV.  It is very limited on the number of inputs and needs to add more.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: hillcountryslacker "hillcountryslacker"
Reviews.Content: What I like about this TV is the info screen, lots of info with next program. Can also show all channels at a glance with what is playing on each - a cool little feature. Very light, great picture sound, and lots of extras like usb for photos/music, easy access buttons on front to turn off - hard to see - which is what you want. Perfect for price.Only thing missing is built in interent and wireless nic, lol.

Reviews.Title: Wow, a great deal!
Reviews.Author: J. Bettner "JB"
Reviews.Content: Great LCD.  Mounted easily.  Picture is great and setup was super quick.  Can't go wrong with Samsung; all of my monitors are samsung and now the office tv is as well.

Reviews.Title: Sound? I can't hear you!
Reviews.Author: Jack Taylor
Reviews.Content: Spent considerable time redesigning/rebuilding bookcase to accommodateour new upsize/upscale TV.Nice.Except that even with the sound turned up fullwe are left straining to hear.Incredible to me that a major brand could be so slipshodwith so important a part of their product.I suppose it's going back to Amazon.And I am left pondering a next step.Sound seems to be a problem with many of the comparable sets.Any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: Prairie Wind
Reviews.Content: This tv is actually our first flatscreen, and so far (we've had it about a month), we've been happy with it. The color quality and picture definition, especially in HD, are outstanding. We have the NFL network, and watching games in HD on this tv is a real pleasure...It almost looks like the game is in 3D sometimes, the picture is so colorful, clear and crisp. The set-up was pretty straight forward, and so far we've had no issues with it. If I had one thing questionable about it to mention, it would be the volume...At times, particularly on some DVD's, it seems to be on the low side, even when turned up almost to the max. This isn't a big issue, and certainly isn't, in my opinion, reason enough to return it...The pluses far outweigh this rather minor, and only, negative. Since this is our first flatscreen, I can't really compare it to others of a similar model, but based on ours, I can definitely recommend this model Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Sound a little low, but overall great tv for the money
Reviews.Author: K. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Pretty good quality for the money. Sound a little low. Plus I couldn't find the remote codes anywhere, so my dish remote is working intermittently. Hate to use dual remotes!Otherwise, pretty much what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: B. Simmons "Lifeguard"
Reviews.Content: Great for our bedroom.  Picture is EXCELLENT and I have not had the sound issues that others have had.  I played around with the settings for the sound a bit and it seems to have solved the problem.  Great deal, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: A lot of TV for not a lot of money
Reviews.Author: C. Smith
Reviews.Content: Nothing to add that hasn't already been said, but this is a great overall deal if you're looking for an LCD for the bedroom.As has been mentioned before, the fact that the TV is 720p shouldn't keep you from purchasing this set as the human eye cannot detect a difference between 720p and 1080p on a display this small.I found the speakers to be more than adequate. If you're looking for movie theater sound, purchase a receiver, sub and the other speakers. The in-TV speakers aren't meant for that.I found the picture quality to be great for a TV at this price point. The only thing I would mention is that if you're planning to extensively watch sports, you might want to consider a 120Hz display instead of the 60Hz that this set offers, but LCDs with such a refresh rate tend to coincide with 1080p and, thus, a higher price tag. I would also recommend calibrating the set to make it a little less bright, and to make the flesh tones more realistic. These settings can be found online.My only gripe would be a lack of HDMI inputs (this set has two), but I'm sure the average consumer would find it to be adequate for a cable/satellite box and a DVD/Blu-Ray player.In summary, this is a great LCD at an even better price.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for price!
Reviews.Author: K. Gibson
Reviews.Content: Just put this TV in bedroom, Great picture and perfect size for our needs. I was a little concerned about the sound quality as we have a 22" Samsung in the kitchen area and the speakers on that set leave a little to be desired. After listening to this TV, the sound is quite good, plus the speakers face the front of the TV, something some other makes do not do. The picture quality is outstanding as we have it connected to an HD cable box with Verizon Fios. Given the low price, you cant go wrong with this set.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and it has an alarm clock too!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Stout
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our bedroom when our 20 year old 27" RCA shot craps.  The old RCA had an alarm mode on it and I had really grown used to using it to wake up in the morning.  I had pretty much resigned myself that I was going to have to get used to the alarm clock again.  Imagine my surprise when I found in the Time setting that there was an "Auto ON" selection.  Actually there are 3 separate auto on settings.We chose the Samsung because of the great ratings and reviews it has received and the alarm mode is just a bonus.  The picture is great, it was easy to set up, and the sound is ok.... thus the 4 stars.  but it's like that with every LCD TV I've ever looked at.  We normally hook ours up to the stereo anyway.  I do have to buy a new cable for that as this TV requires a different cable than what I already have.  So if you have an older stereo that you plan to hook this up to be on notice to buy a new cable.  The audio out is just one output instead of 2 or 3.  Your old cable will not work.  I would definitely buy this again.  Next will be a 46" with the Apps.  when the prices drop under $1000.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: Jennifer 312
Reviews.Content: Performs as expected.  Great value for the money.  My only complaint is the sound -- specifically, the volume.  I have to have the volume turned almost all the way up in order to hear it clearly.  This is my first LCD TV (finally got rid of the big box!), but I've heard from friends this is a common complaint so I'm not really docking my overall rating.  Still, it's disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Comes Through Again
Reviews.Author: Jim M "Retired"
Reviews.Content: This is the second flat panel HDTV we have bought from Amazon.  Both Samsung.  We had the larger one for the living room and this second one for a bedroom (No we do not lie in bed to watch).  In both cases they had the specs we wanted and the price was excellent.  Delivery was prompt.  Of course, the smaller one was just delivered to the door, but setup was simple and easy.  Strongly recommend Amazon for these items as their reputation and service are superb.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: L. Smith
Reviews.Content: No more Sonys for me.  Samsung has the finest quality picture on the market.  This is one fine TV.

Reviews.Title: picture size
Reviews.Author: Charlie Smith "Charlie"
Reviews.Content: I could not get the right size picture on the screen. I had Comcast check out the cable..OK  I talked Samsung customer service several times and they suggested I send it back to their service dept.

Reviews.Title: Great Seller -- Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: Arlitto
Reviews.Content: This seller gave me everything I wanted. When there was a small issue that I left feedback on, the seller immediately sought to work things out and to come up with a compromise that would work for the both of us. The TV is spectacular, and I strongly suggest purchasing a wall-mount since that's the best way to enjoy this flat screen.

Reviews.Title: Weak tv, I expected much better from Samsung
Reviews.Author: Dom
Reviews.Content: Well, after running around for three days trying to find a Vizio e320vl at walmart and sams, and not being able to find one for under 300 I compromised and gave in to this samsung from walmart for 350 just as a temp until I could find the vizio. But boy am I glad I didnt keep this unit.Lets start off with the basics, connections, there are not very many. I am old school and have a nice older 2 channel sony receiver which I Want to use with this unit. Nope not happening, unless I buy some digital converter for 20 bucks.Moving on to the picture, not very good at all. Its not as crisp and vivid as the vizio. On netflix I noticed the red background was dull. And nothing looked great at all.Watching regular HD tv there was mad pixelation between scenes. Not very smooth. It managed to look good on some stuff but not great like you would expect.The sound is absolutely horrible as well, I had it turned up to 100 and could barely hear it, clearly either the speakers were messed up on this one or they just suck in general.Overall this tv is not worth the money. It feels like a light cheap piece of crap plastic when you pick it up and it really shows in the quality.Remote is very nice but thats about it. The setting and options are also limited on this model. I was expecting a high quality tv from a brand like samsung but it is of much lower quality than the 300 dollar vizio I have now.

Reviews.Title: Good Product Bad Sound
Reviews.Author: kbkitty98
Reviews.Content: Very quick shipping, however the sound does not work. We would like to return or exchange and have not received a prompt response from the seller.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen tv and I did a lot of research before deciding on this one. I choose the Samsung brand because I heard good things about it and my roommates two tvs are both Samsung and work great. Also Amazon had a pretty good deal on this one so I went for it.I am very happy with it. Setup was a breeze right out of the box. The stand that it comes with can make the tv a bit wobbly if not properly screwed in so make sure to do that and it will be great. The 32 inch size is is a slight step up from my old 26 inch in my room but its so much lighter! I love flat screens! Works great in my room where I watch most of my tv programs.If you get this tv make sure to get hdmi cables as well. It makes the picture much better. Sound is fine too.All in all very happy happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great first HDTV.
Reviews.Author: sm
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV because I had an old traditional box TV. Samsumg is a well-known, good brand. I read a lot of reviews before getting the TV and made my final decision on this one. It's a great size for a bedroom and the price is good for the TV. The quality is great and I've watched DVDs on the TV that I wouldn't have thought would have a great picture otherwise. I also play X-box and the screen is big enough almost like you are in the games.

Reviews.Title: It's a Samsung
Reviews.Author: Chunky D "couch tater"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to replace the 29' tube I handed down to a nephew for college.  I already own a 52" 7series Samsung and am still astonished about his picture and sound.  I read many reviews about this tv and finally purchased it when the price hit my sweet spot.  It is everything I thought it would be.  The picture is very good for 60hz and the sound is a bit tinny sounding.  I don't understand about the loudness of the tv which people complained about.  It is what it si.  It is plenty loud for my bedroom; I turn up not half way and can hear it down the hall.I am very satisfied with the overall quality of this purchase and would not hesitate on buying it again.

Reviews.Title: perfect low end name brand TV
Reviews.Author: Colin S
Reviews.Content: This does everything I hoped it would after I finally switched to a flat screen.  Plays off of a spare laptop I have to it's VGA port, and get's TV channels with a digital reciever.  It has a good picture with low glare, not too much flashiness to it and I am able to read and browse through netflix on it from 8 feet away.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Sandrea
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv in order to be able to connect the tv to the computer and watch tv without using cable tv services.  It has a great picture and a good amount of connections in the back for hooking up devices.  I do not currently have HD shows so can't rate that aspect of the picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: CMfromIL
Reviews.Content: TV is an excellent value for the price.  Setup is a breeze, all you need is a philips head screwdriver and 5 minutes.TV is very light and easy to adjust.  Menu is simple, and changing settings is intuitive.  After initial setup, I just use my DirecTV controller to handle on/off.Sound is more than adequate for home usage.  Perhaps if you were to try to use in a bar or something it would be lacking.Colors are sharp, and HD channels look very nice.  For a TV it's size 1080p isn't really necessary unless you wanted to use it for a computer monitor.I'm very pleased and would recommend it to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: What's Not To Love?
Reviews.Author: James P. Coyne "Italian by Marriage"
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung 52" HDTV (in a second home) but space for this set in my apartment permitted only a 32" screen.  I love the 52" and so does everyone who sees it, so I was sold on the Samsung Brand.  When I saw this 32" on Amazon available at roughly $350, I saw no reason to hesitate.  I've only recently changed my cable service in my apartment to HD, and the difference between Standard and HD with the Samsung is like switching from B&W; to Color in the old days, even at 720p.  This set is relatively simple, a no-frills set, which is all I wanted to pay for, but it has an HDMI input for the DVD player, a USB input for my computer if I so choose, and that's all I need.  At this price, this set is a terrfic bargain and I have no complaints or faults to cite whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Consumer
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV and it arrived earlier then what was posted. I've seen it set up in stores and when I finally got it set up it looked GREAT and sounds awesome. There is no regret at all with me buying this TV and if I had the money I would buy another one for another room in the house. I got it through Amazon and that is my 2 cents.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for your $
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I recently bought one at Best Buy on sale for $329.00...get'em while they last !!! After demo-ing countless others, I couldn't find a  better all-around 32" LCD HD TV in this catergory for the money any where ! I'm no high tech geek so I won't try to detail all the pro's with this TV....simply put, what a superb picture !!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: JUL
Reviews.Content: This would be my first flat screen. I had to get an HDMI cable for a real good picture but after that it came in pretty nice.  Light weight, space saver, good picture. I haven't tried to hook up anything else but so far so good. I had it for a month so far.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32C350
Reviews.Author: Fred Ackerman
Reviews.Content: All my doubts were dispelled when I hooked this flat screen LCD up.  It is superb!The sharpness, color and almost 3D nature of the picture is stunning.  The layout and controls are fairly easy to understand. You can tweak the adjustments if you like; but basically the quality of the picture was great both from HD cable and even with ordinary cable stations.  The audio is okay and could be a little louder; but, hey for this price I am not complaining. Go Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Solid TV, But Sound Is Disappointment, Blurry Without HD
Reviews.Author: Ambergris "John Thomas"
Reviews.Content: I have to admit up front that this is my first foray into the flat screen market.  Any kind of flat screen.  Up until just a couple of months ago I was still watching one of those big heavy tube style TVs that finally died. After much searching the stats and reviews here on Amazon, I settled on this Samsung model, for my last TV was a Samsung and it lasted what seemed forever.  I also have to admit that a TV set to me remains just that, a TV.  I don't do any gaming on it, hook it up to any computers, or any other premium stuff beyond the DVD player.  So this review is strictly from the standpoint of an old fashioned couch potato.The Samsung is very easy to set up, and pretty much simple to get started and even customize without getting into the instructions, (which all men hate doing anyway).  The picture right out of the box is acceptable, but just about anyone will want to customize whatever is offered with that feature.  One thing I noticed about this model is that it carries very little in the way of preset color schemes, like some others I researched have. There are only three, and my experience with the trio left me with no great impression of them being just right.  All three will still have the average Joe wanting too fiddle with the contrast, brightness, etc.  However there is ample offerings in that area to satisfy anyone who strives for the perfect picture.  As far as the sound is concerned, I am afraid that I have to agree with the other reviewers here who feel it is substandard.  It is indeed a disappointment in that it has no real depth or power to it like one would hope for.  It's sufficient in how loud it can get, and sounds better than my last set to be sure, but it isn't much beyond that in either quantity or quality. (Also, a built in equalizer offers the user the opportunity to boost the loudness on 5 frequencies, which did make quite a difference). If you're one of those people that likes real theater sound along with your movie, you will have to settle for adding a better sound system to this model, and bypassing the TV speakers.  Something that is as easy as selecting it on the settings menu.Finally, one thing that I was surprised and disappointed at was the blurriness of of the picture without an HD signal. Though the color and brightness of this TV is excellent, for me no amount of tweaking with the settings or the sharpness control gave me a picture that was as crisp and clear as my old TV.  Some online research on the problem has proven to me that its all about the input signal from your cable or satellite provider.  Without going into a lot of technical mumbo jumbo, let is suffice that no matter what kind of TV you buy, this may be a problem you run into if you buy a new LCD and opt for sticking with a standard, or digital signal.  Like just about every other kind of electronic device, when the industry decides to move ahead on something and make it "better" they don't have a lot of patience for those that choose to remain nostalgic.  For me its just a problem I will have to live with until I decide to move up to HD TV.  Certainly not is the picture so blurry as to be a deal breaker and have me returning the TV.  I still feel it is an excellent, solid TV that will provide you with many years of service, and that still displays an excellent picture with rich color and brightness...Recommended for the track record I have enjoyed with all Samsung TVs....

Reviews.Title: Stay away from Samsung TV's
Reviews.Author: aeo
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV 2 years ago. It died suddenly and won't power on.Apparently they used poor capacitors during manufacturing, which fail after a short while. There was a class action lawsuit regarding the issue. According to the Samsung support person, our TV is not covered; and the lawsuit website is already taken down. She said we'll have to pay to get it fixed!STAY AWAY from Samsung TV's!!! I don't have unrealistic expectations, but if you issue a faulty product, the ethical thing to do would be to fix the issue. Clearly business ethics at Samsung is in short supply, unlike their faulty capacitors.

Reviews.Title: Has lasted me 3 years so far and still going great!
Reviews.Author: Aaron Stark
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv for college and for the price I was slightly apprehensive of the quality. This tv greatly exceeded my expectations and is all I use when playing xbox and watching Netflix. Three years on and many moves later, this tv has held up to the test and is still going great! The color and pictures are extremely clear and the stand that comes with the tv is fairly sturdy.

Reviews.Title: 3 Years and Counting
Reviews.Author: S. Abebe
Reviews.Content: Love this TV. I've used it to play games, watch movies and connect it to my Macbook. It has great color, the sound CAN be loud but it often depends on the source of whatever it is you're watching. If it's TV it's probably going to be on the lower side. If you have a movie or video game with and HDMI connection, it'll get plenty loud. I only wish it was full 1080p but for the price on a student budget it was perfect for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Met Expectations
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I'm not a television expert, but I think the picture quality is great. My only complaint is the weak audio. I have turned the volume up to the maximum level to understand soft voices. Also I bought the television used and I haven't noticed any defects. Overall a great purchase for the price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: william lesher
Reviews.Content: I think I paid a premium price for this TV and could have spent less for equal preformance. If I had it to do over I would have purchased a competing brand and saved money

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Nnb
Reviews.Content: Great buy for the price. I would have preferred if speakers were front facing and not rear but works just fine. HD channels display crisp and vivid in detail. Love Samsung, currently have 4 in my home. Their customer service is superior.

Reviews.Title: Great TV,but get ready....
Reviews.Author: Donald Carter
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV 2 yrs. ago at Kmart,and I loved it.Crisp,cool colors,good connectivity,and all around beauty,however, I am now having power troubles ( remote no longer works, cannot power TV off). I have to unplug it from the wall. Seems Samsung used cheap capacitors,(Google it). I plan on repairing mine myself,but just so you all know.This is not a rare occasion. Other than that, I still love the set.

Reviews.Title: HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!
Reviews.Author: Andrew B. Mallon
Reviews.Content: Burned out after two years. Samsung's tech support said warranty was only for one year and we'd have to pay their local service shop. I called them and their recorded message said i had to first call Samsung for a repair number! Enough running around with Samsung, we will buy another company's TV...

Reviews.Title: TV has a blue line down the center of the screen
Reviews.Author: Blueline
Reviews.Content: I have had this Samsung Tv for about two years. About five months after I brought it a blue line appeared right down the center of the screen and there is nothing I can do to fix it. I check the internet to see if there was a salution for it; and it said that this is a known problem with Samsung LCD HDTVs. I may as well buy a new TV for the price I would have to pay to Fix it.

Reviews.Title: Very Good for the Value
Reviews.Author: J. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about a year ago but have yet to write a review. After a year I still have had no problems with it. It's been a perfect TV for our bedroom, sitting about 10 feet away from the head of our bed. The picture quality has been great with no glitches or issues. As for the volume issues that others have written about - it is a tad softer than I had hoped for but has never really been an issue. I have had to watch some movies at full volume, but it's never been so low that I couldn't properly hear it (we don't use any surround sound).Considering it was one of the least expensive of those in its category, we've been extremely happy with it. I think you can purchase it without any fears.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" HDTV
Reviews.Author: greeneyes
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our bedroom in our second home. We didn't want to spend alot of money but still wanted a good picture and a good quality TV. We got everything we were hoping for and more.  The picture is vivid with great sound. Would definited recommend this TV!

Reviews.Title: Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: Kevin R. Klar
Reviews.Content: I picked up the unit as a replacement for the computer monitor i was using.... wow this has been awesome what a difference

Reviews.Title: NICE BUT NOT GREAT
Reviews.Author: MARY T.
Reviews.Content: I LIKE THE TELEVISION SET, IT HAS A GOOD PICTURE AND THE DESIGN IS NICE. THE ONLY FEATURE THAT IS NOT QUITE UP TO PAR IS THE SOUND BUT I DID EXPECT THAT BECAUSE IN THE REVIEWS ON AMAZON OTHER CUSTOMERS MENTIONED THAT THE SOUND WASN'T THE BEST ON THIS TV.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!
Reviews.Author: Ellen B.
Reviews.Content: Comcast just set it up.  I just love it!!  What a great TV for the money.  We have this one in a bedroom.  It came with a remote, of course, but Comcast brought a remote for HD.  The remote that came with it is not for HD, but is needed to switch from the tv to the dvd player. All-in-all, VERY good buy.

Reviews.Title: Good quality. Sound could be better
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The TV has great picture quality. The sound is not the best especially with the bass but with a sound system it's not really a factor. There could be a few more inputs but there are enough. Solid stand as well. Over-all a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: dee
Reviews.Content: This is the first time we've bought such a large item over the internet.  We've always gone to stores and looked at things like tv's.  However, we knew the approximate size of the screen we wanted and then simply chose.  The Samsung received really high ratings, and the rest was easy.  It was delivered within a few days in excellent condition.  Everything was easy.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Marcos
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with this Samsung product. For more details read other 5 star reviews, I agree with them.

Reviews.Title: Just an Idea
Reviews.Author: Caleb
Reviews.Content: I have owned this tv since the beginning of the year and still narrowing down the specifics on what i want for a perfect picture. I have a xbox360 hooked up on hdmi and standard HDTV Cable input on the coaxial ant in port. the picture is outstanding on hdmi inputs. but these are the best settings color wise (in my opinion) to have implemented.Mode: Standard (least amount of limited options in the picture mode settings)Backlight: 10 (subject to lighting within your room)Contrast: 92Brightness: 46Sharpness: 10Color: 53Tint: 50/50Advanced SettingsBlack Tone: DarkDynamic Contrast: LowGamma +1Color Space: NativeWhite Balance: R-offset 24, R-Gain 27Flesh Tone: +1Edge Enhancement: On (this has been changed back and forth many times still unsure exactly what I personally like more)The Picture Options setting is all up to your personal preference it changes things slightly. This is just how I see it working out the best picture wise. It is a bedroom TV and I have a Very well lit room with 4 60W light bulbs running off a ceiling fan. the room dimensions are 18' by 20' with the ceiling fan directly in the center of the ceiling. the TV is by far the best tv i have ever owned my previous tv is a 27" rca crt. I guess anything lcd is an upgrade lol.For the price and quality Samsung really packs in the extras, i highly recommend this tv to anyone who wants style options and a low price for a very respectable lcd.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Leyna
Reviews.Content: We love this TV! The picture is beautiful!!Now if we only had a decent cable company life would be great!!

Reviews.Title: Good quality/valued HDTV
Reviews.Author: Fryguy
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to spice up my trailer/room in Iraq.  It was one of the lightest in the class, which I hope will make it cheaper to mail back to the States when I go home.  This is a great TV for XBox 360, and for viewing movies from my laptop.  I agree with others that it doesn't have great speakers, which is to be expected for the weight/cost.  I wish it had an audio out that is compatible with computer speakers (for gaming with the XBox).  The touch controls are functional, but I would prefer a tactile response.  I had to paint the symbols silver so you could see where the buttons are.  I'd buy this TV again, if I had to do it over again.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Paul Grimmeisen
Reviews.Content: This TV was exactly what my son wanted for his video games.  I could not have been more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Super Awesome LCD TV
Reviews.Author: R.A.B.
Reviews.Content: Awesome quality picture very rich color 35,000:1 dynamic contrast .I get alot of compliments on my 32 inch samsung the sound isnt the greatest tho for this size of television .The design is good as well .I would have to give this LCD TV a 4.85 out of 5 stars .Anyone looking for a 32 inch LCD tv this is the one to buy ...

Reviews.Title: Picture is very good but sound is tinny and with echo
Reviews.Author: Ramsil
Reviews.Content: Great picture but the sound is tinny and at times has an echo. I use it to watch movies and the tinny quality of sound makes it for a bad experience.

Reviews.Title: :AWESOME"
Reviews.Author: Parisi
Reviews.Content: Great TV it all so has a out standing picture as well at a great price as well god for gameing on as well and it all so works a your pc monter as well.

Reviews.Title: WOW!WOw!wow!
Reviews.Author: loraliromance
Reviews.Content: Seriously I spent a lot of time comparing this to the LG TV that I also wanted that at the time while they were both on sale were in my price range (this one slightly too high at the time). I almost bought the LG even though I have a silly love for Samsung products. Then i got on eBay, found someone selling it for the price of the LG and was sold :) I got it and boy I do not regret it one bit. The color is amazing (you'll have to mess with the settings a bit if you're a gamer). The only downfall isn't really a downfall, if you're wanting this TV for a big big room invest in some speakers, however if you're like me and it's for a small/medium sizeish room it's great. BUT! YOU MUST CHANGE THE AUDIO SETTINGS otherwise even with volume maxed out I could barely hear my Blue Ray DVD playing over my air conditioner (it's a sorta loud A/C). I actually got sad when I noticed this and then I remembered someone mentioning in a review to check the audio settings. I was watching a blue ray on my PS3 when I noticed it (by the way blue ray looks lovely) and the person also mentioned that it can some times be settings on your blue ray player, cable box or even ps3. I haven't tinkered with the ps3 settings yet because turning all of my audio settings up on the TV was the ticket for me, now at half volume the TV is pretty loud and very clear.Gamers will not regret this TV one bit if they take a few minutes to tinker with the color settings. When you first play a game you'll think it's insanely too dark, mess with it a bit and the quality is just lovely. I was playing Uncharted 2 on it and it's the prettiest I've seen it yet.One last comment for those skeptical because it's 720p and not 1080p, don't be. On a 32inch screen it makes no difference, the human eye cannot discern the difference between 720p & 1080p on a 32inch screen. You really don't have to shell out the big bucks for amazing quality or because it has a 1080p sticker on it.Anywho, hope this review was helpful. In my opinion if you are able to get this at a good deal don't settle for something else cause it's $30 cheaper or something, you will regret it. The only other flaw I think anyone could have with it was not enough inputs, I used the HDMI for my ps3, the VGA for my Xbox 360 and the RCA for my Wii but I also wanted to plug in my PS2 (RCA) and there wasn't enough space, but for any person besides me I'm sure it's plenty.All in all 5 stars! BUY THIS TV! :)

Reviews.Title: My new 32" Samsung
Reviews.Author: Sidphx
Reviews.Content: Again, another great Samsung purchase. Perfect for the bedroom. I know folks have complained about the sound but I find it to be great short of purchasing a home theater. I bought this from Amazon...what a great merchant. Free fast shipping and low price.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Catherine A. Lopez
Reviews.Content: It is an amazing product for the price.  It is bigger than I thought it would be too.  We do have to turn the volume up pretty high for some reason with our directv, but other than that it is fabulous!

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up, easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Dog Lover
Reviews.Content: I own six flat panel TV's (two houses).  All are pretty good now, so I just look for small differences.  Probably the best attribute of the Samsung is very good sound for a 32" set.  The speakers are in the front, are very clear, and have adequate volume.  The picture is good.  Set up is easy.  It does what it should.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: michelle435
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Can't believe how good the picture quality is with a TV for this price.  Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: This tv is great
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I'm super happy with it. The picture and sound are amazing. Not thrilled about the lack of component inputs and the quality of the VGA input is horrible, but aside from that, the tv is just incredible.Better review at thegrindery.com

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32C350 HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ardvark
Reviews.Content: The TV works very well, is used in the master bedroom. The sound sound and picture are very good. It was easy to set up!

Reviews.Title: Good image quality
Reviews.Author: L. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I bought this LCD for a room were I watch it from 12-15ft away. Image quality is good and sound is excellent. good price.. So far I'm happy and would recommend this TV to anyone

Reviews.Title: Exceeded Expectations
Reviews.Author: Elroy Jetson
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy setup. Because this television is in my exercise room, I actually watch it more than the bigger 1080P LED TV in the living room. A 32" screen is probably about as big as you want to go with 720P, which could be why a lot of brands jump from 32" 720P to 37" 1080P without any choices in between. The set only has 2 HDMI inputs, so it limits how many HD devices you  can connect. I've got a Roku in one and a BluRay in the other. For audio, it has RCA inputs, but a 3.5mm output instead of RCA outs, so I had to get a 3.5mm to RCA adapter to connect an old stereo receiver. The TV remote does not control volume on the audio output, so you need your receiver's remote for volume control. It also has a set of component inputs, and a USB port for viewing your own media and installing upgrades via thumb drive.Antenna reception is excellent. I really like the tuner on this set, it gives you a listing of all the stations you've programmed in, and show descriptions of every group of channels you've surfed through (provided the broadcaster included the information in their signal). Digital air channels typically have one HD primary (11.1 for example), and one or more SD sidebands (11.2, 11.3, and so on). So if I've hit one of the "11" channels, all of "11"s program listings can be displayed. And if I hop on up to "13", "11"s listings aren't forgotten. Analog channels are seamlessly integrated by channel number - I go from 13.2 to 15 to 29 to 31.1. I definitely like this TV's tuner better than the one on the living room LG set.The remote is very comfortable, and is ergonomically shaped so you always know that it's pointed the right way (I often grab my other remotes "backwards").If you're looking for a second or third TV, or have limited space for your primary TV, this 32" Samsung is worthy of serious consideration.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: JOHN CHAVANNE
Reviews.Content: Purchased two of the Samsung 32" TV's for our second home master and guest bedrooms. Many choices available and some for less money. I actually analyzed the reviews on the various brands offered and selected Samsung because it had the least number of one and two star reviews vs four and five stars. Was up and running very quickly and am very happy with our purchase. The 32" seems to be the largest size where a 720 vs 1080 resolution is acceptable. I chose not to go the extra $100 or so for 1080 and find the picture quality to be very good.Thanks Amazon for another great buying experience. I find that the info available on your site is way more complete and helpful than any of the retail stores.

Reviews.Title: Very good LCD TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Hearing Impairment
Reviews.Content: This is a very good LCD TV for the price.  I purchased this TV through Amazon, (always check Amazon's price) at the time they had the best price out there $330.  For a 720p, the picture quality is exceptional.  The inputs on this TV are limited a coaxial cable, composite video for HD, regular video for digital reception and a PC connection.  I consider this a great TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Keller "Papa Jeff"
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful TV for a bedroom.  Picture quality is the best. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles but enough inputs for DVD or game input.  Cann't miss for the price

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Gift Card
Reviews.Content: Looked all around for a flat screen and came across this one at Costco for $354.00 a week ago. I almost bought a Toshiba on line here ( that would have been a huge mistake!! ) I looked at them on line here and at Costco. YUK picture...... So far I really like this TV. The sales persons stated that this TV was/is better then the Sony, and that they all had one. ( I asked several what they thought )  I also agreed after looking at all the models that Samsung had the better picture and price. You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: VGA input!, but one annoying glitch
Reviews.Author: David Hovemeyer
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for two reasons: it had consistently good reviews, and it has a VGA input.  Overall, we are very happy with it.  The picture quality is excellent, and it is easy to set up and use.  Having the VGA input is great: we can use Youtube, watch DVDs, and play games with ease using our computer.  We also use the AV input for our Wii.We have only two complaints.  First, the sound quality is not great, although of course you can always use your own speakers.  Second, there is a stupid glitch: if the AV or VGA input is selected, and the input is off, the TV goes input power saving mode after a few seconds.  The would be fine, except that this happens even if you're in the process of trying to select another input!  This makes it rather difficult to switch inputs.Overall, it's a very good TV, and a good value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Small room!!
Reviews.Author: JP from TJ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV after having an awful experience with a Westinghouse 32'led HDTV, i returned it with no problem at all, got my money back and then got this Samsung for the same price and a $20 dlls disscount for the bad experience on the Westinghouse. I couldn't be happier first of all, with Amazon's customer service, and then with the TV which is a great TV for my bedroom and for the Price you couldn't ask for more.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch HD TV
Reviews.Author: Linda W. Fielding "HalfWhit"
Reviews.Content: The TV is great, good picture, good sound, easy hook up.  Only problem for me is the sleep timer - you can only set it for pre-set times, 30 minutes, 60 minutes, etc.  I like to put in the minutes left for a program or a shorter time.  Otherwise, a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality, Unbelieveable Price
Reviews.Author: FRQUNTSHPPR
Reviews.Content: I just received my TV this morning as a replacement for one that my mover broke.  It is wonderful.  Easy to set up.  Great Picture and Sound!

Reviews.Title: Proud Purchase
Reviews.Author: M. Ruffner
Reviews.Content: First of all, the TV arrived super-fast and in great condition.  Regarding the TV, itself, I originally wanted to purchase a 1080p but a techy-friend advised that 780p would still provide a great picture for a 32" TV.  WOW!  What a great picture - so smooth and bright, very clear and sharp.  I have NO REGRETS!  I don't see reflections of items/people/lights in the room on the TV screen, which is always a nuisance.  Set up was easy and straight-forward - it automatically pops up when turned on.  Sound is good overall, but I have to really crank it up when I'm walking on the treadmill - but maybe that's a treadmill issue (oops).  And, I didn't give the 'design layout' 5 stars simply because I prefer a matte border on the TV frame.  Otherwise, I think I really got a deal.  I was fairly confident purchasing this TV online because I had read reports of it being the best buy for its size/specs...now that I've had it over a month, I would confidently, and highly, recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: I love Samsung TVs
Reviews.Author: J. More
Reviews.Content: I have a 60in Samsung tv in my living room that I love but was disappointed with the sound (I connected it to my surround sound system and muted the actual TV and it's totally fine for that room. So when it came time to obtain a TV for my bedroom, it was an obvious choice to stick with Samsung, and I admit I was concerned about having to buy a sound bar or system for a bedroom. Upon setting it up, I dug into the controls and settings and found numerous options. for a 12x12 room, once the settings were to my personal liking, the sound is fantastic. I'm going to go back and mess with my other Samsung now and see if I missed settings.If you expect this to be just right for you out of the box, it won't happen. Everyone's preferences and needs are different. Take the time to mess with the settings, it's worth it.Set up is extremely simple, the only "assembly" was 3 screws for the stand. I will advise make sure that the screws are SNUG or when you go to set the TV upright it will wobble around (scary!) There's more than enough connections for my personal needs and having HDMI vs a gazillion a/v wires is sweet.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Paulgro
Reviews.Content: Was very easy to assemble and set up right out of the box. Picture and sound quality is great. I would recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: riverhawks
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after researching for about 3 months. This TV was for our bedroom.So the TV fits the room perfectly , the TV is very slim and has good picture with sound. Great buy for the Price can never go wrong with Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great buy, easy set up no audio problems
Reviews.Author: Kermit P. Moreau Jr. "Kaypee"
Reviews.Content: I could not be more pleased with this set.  Set up was so easy my wife said she could have done it and she is not the mechanical person in this relationship. Picuture quality is excellent. The audio was fine despite all of the negative reviews I saw concenring sound. If you want great sound install a suround sound system.  We installed in our 14X14 bedroom and found it just the right size for that room. On the screen set us was intuitive and easy.  I was able to program my dirct TV remote to control all the functions of the TV which is a big pluss for me.  The setting that worked was 10812.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "technology junkie"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace an old bedroom TV.  It's an entry-level model, exactly what I needed: low cost, not overloaded with features, great picture, adequate sound.  Surprisingly light and easy to set up.  If you need a no-frills TV with excellent video quality, this is a cost-effective solution for you.  Pair it with a small surround-sound system and it could even be an acceptable primary TV for a small apartment.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM THIS SELLER!
Reviews.Author: Jordan C. Gros "Jordan Gros"
Reviews.Content: Please do not purchase anything from Tradeport.  I ordered a 32inch Samsung LCD.  Plugged it in and the display didn't work (ie. it powered "On" but there was no picture).  I tried calling their customer service and the rep said there was nothing they would do about it.  Currently trying to resolve this with Amazon-who has been very helpful, by the way.DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM TRADEPORT.  They are thieves.

Reviews.Title: Conked out!
Reviews.Author: Davey
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately the television has died on us after less than a year--no pulse, it just will not come on.  Before it died, it was fine (though the speakers were never much to write home about).UPDATE as of Jan. 2014: Right after the TV died, we sent it to a Samsung-approved repairman. He fixed it at no cost to us. It has worked fine ever since.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Trevor Drescher "Trev"
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace some TV's in my house pretty quickly and didn't have a lot of money to do it. I saw this TV and purchased it on Amazon for $329. It's a beautiful set! I thought buying it for so cheap I would be getting a lower quality TV, but it has a nice picture quality and sound. I set my sleep timer before bed and life is good! For anyone out there, wanting a quality TV for less....I recommend this TV!

Reviews.Title: The sound is the only downfall
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: This product is fantastic. The high definition hook-up to my Xbox 360 looks amazing and the picture is perfect. The only downfall to this item is the volume which can be loud at parts but when people speak in movies it is hard to hear as if it is a whisper. All you would need is surround sound for your room. I'd definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Lisa V. Fox
Reviews.Content: We liked the one we got last year so much we bought another one.  Excellent price and quality.

Reviews.Title: Bad sound
Reviews.Author: TheBrood
Reviews.Content: When I researched this TV prior to buying it, I ignored a review saying it had sound problems. I can now confirm that the speakers on this TV are quite bad. Do not buy unless you have other sound options. I give this item a 3.5/5.0

Reviews.Title: It works for me.
Reviews.Author: MommyDearest
Reviews.Content: It was this or the Bravia.  I bought a Bravia a year ago in the same size that work equally well or better.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV is excellent!
Reviews.Author: Joan Schober
Reviews.Content: I would have bought this same TV at Best Buy or any of the other stores, BUT found this had the best price, service and delivery.  When you get the actual item in two days and installed the same day, you can't beat that at all!!!  Excellent picture, great color and I don't have HD and it is STILL great!!!

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: steve keeney
Reviews.Content: I needed a new TV but didn't want to spend a lot.  I ran across this samsung everywhere I went: Walmart, Best Buy, Sears...So I read up on it on the net and found all good reviews.  I got one and hooked it up to a Clearstream 2 antenna and it gets a great picture!  All channels are now broadcast in digital with many in HD.  Some info says broadcast HD is cleaner than cable or satellite HD - I don't know about all that but over the air TV is free !!People who are having problems with the sound volume need to check out all the options on the menu and their cable box.  If you have to turn it up all the way, well then something isn't hooked up right.  I turn it up to 30 and its plenty loud. SO IF THE VOLUME ISN'T LOUD ENOUGH, FIGURE OUT WHAT YOU HOOKED UP WRONG AND FIX IT.  ITS NOT THE TV, ITS THE OPERATOR. Do you really think they would sell a TV that you can't hear?Check the cable / satellite box.

Reviews.Title: Simple and complete
Reviews.Author: Susan D. Bandin
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install. Good picture quality. Volume a little less than expected. Overall satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: F. Chiarella "Pamela"
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great product for the price! The picture and sound are both quality, and I haven't had any problems with it! My only complaint about this product is the TV stand it comes with.  If you don't plan on mounting the TV, you may be disappointed with the stand it comes with.  Very poor quality.Overall though, I would highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: art
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my purchase. After shopping some electronics stores Amazon had the best price.The merchandise was received promptly and in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV Excellent
Reviews.Author: Neil Farlow "Bud"
Reviews.Content: This 32" flat panel TV is excellent and well worth the price.  It was activated easily and fit the wall attachment precisely.  It is my third Samsung LCD TV and works flawlessly. It is attached to cable TV but not in HD.  Nevertheless, the picture is excellent and suits our purposes just fine.  The sound is okay for us with our hearing aids in a small room.

Reviews.Title: We suspect damaged in shipment....returned next day..defective and picture quality and bad purple line through screen
Reviews.Author: Steve in California
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, rec'd and installed and realized TV was defective/damaged, by unknown reasons. I had it boxed up within two hours and called for return. Picture was poor, purple line through screen, and few hookups in rear. Amazon was gracious in refunding me the  money and paying for return to vendor. Vendor was extremely nice and accomodating and had picked up the next day.  Being disabled and spending most of my time in bed, the TV was very important to me and I was very disappointed, but these things happen.

Reviews.Title: 32" Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: DnK Powell "dnkpowell"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for the price.  We've been very happy with our purchase and would recommend this tv to others.

Reviews.Title: came broken
Reviews.Author: peter
Reviews.Content: Just got the TV today and it was broken, screen was EXTREMELY bright even though i changed the TV settings to the darkest. After awhile the screen would go blue.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: PHLBALLS
Reviews.Content: AWESOME PICTURE AND GREAT PRICEYOU WILL NEED A  90 DEGREE HDMI ADAPTER IF YOU ARE HANGING IT FROM THE WALL

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, good price
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: Great TV so far.  The stand seems a little flimsy, but probably no worse than anything these days. It seems to hold the TV just fine.Update: One year later, the tv is doing great, and I've had no problems with the stand.

Reviews.Title: Happy and sad
Reviews.Author: Beverly Franken
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my Samsung, but after I paid a technician to install it a  friend told me she got the same set from Amazon, and installation was included in the price.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG 32"
Reviews.Author: Giggles
Reviews.Content: I LIKE EVERYTHING ABOUT THE TV EXCEPT THE PLASTIC BASE IT SITS ON. I THINK IT SHOULD BE MADE OUT OF MEDAL TO SUPPORT THE TV BETTER.

Reviews.Title: HDTV
Reviews.Author: freddy48
Reviews.Content: It was not what I had expected. It is OK, but much room for improvement.
